thread.section_title: Hotel le Tourville - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent location; Very clean and decent; Great staff
thread.title_full: Excellent location; Very clean and decent; Great staff - Review of Hotel le Tourville, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: MIkeyCh
title: Excellent location; Very clean and decent; Great staff
text: Small rooms but very clean and tidy with all the requirement amenities. Location is superb very close to the Invalides, Eiffel Tower and Ecole Militaire - also very close to the metro station. Staff is very friendly and helpful.
